ygData.subject: RE: mino horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s truly odd - 2 days ago a friend of mine was playing his 40th level Druid, and the Minotaur Guards in Meldraths room conned green, and never even
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:19 AM 10/20/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
> >The minos in Steamfont are weaker than the minos in the Gorge of King Xorrb
> >(all except for one Mino Hero who is a real meanie!)
>
>Actually, you're right about the mino slavers, but the minotaur guards in
>Meldrath's room are blue to a lvl 50 and hit for 75+. They are very mean. =)
>They make the Minotaur Hero look like pansy. Well, since last I checked
>anyways (bout 3 weeks ago).


That's truly odd - 2 days ago a friend of mine was playing his 40th level
Druid, and the Minotaur Guards in Meldraths room conned green, and never
even attacked him, while Meldrath was a "risky" blue (and kicked his butt
most mightily, I might add.). I kept telling him "You need a Bard. A Bard
could help with that. You know... if you had a Bard....." He hates me now ;)

Talies
